title: The Category Is...After Show Episode One
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Great recap guys. Loved how you folks broke everything down about the episode of Pose season 2. Btw, I totally agree with Michael's theory on what's about to come later on with Angel's career. I think her truth will get exposed later on in the episode. Because Pose is intent on depicting the REALITIES of what happens to Gay and Transgender individuals in the real world; hate, bigotry, discrimination etc....
description:
Welcome to the Pose on FX Season 2 After Show! 
Hosts are MaryGirl Moody and Michael Mullins-Wright. Let's discuss the current episode and important social topics surrounding it.

► ► SUBSCRIBE
